meanings.definition: The quality or state of being airtight or impermeable to gas.
meanings.sent1: The gastightness of the container ensured no gas could escape.
meanings.sent2: The gastightness of the balloon kept the helium inside.
meanings.sent3: The gastightness of the fridge made sure the smelly cheese didn't affect other foods.
meanings.sent4: Her argument had a gastightness that left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The gastightness of the seal was so strong, not even a whisper of gas could pass through.

meanings.definition: The ability of a material or structure to prevent the passage of gas.
meanings.sent1: The gastightness of the rubber stopper stopped any gas from leaking out.
meanings.sent2: The gastightness of the metal pipe ensured no gas escaped.
meanings.sent3: The gastightness of the bubble wrap made it impossible for the air to escape.
meanings.sent4: The gastightness of the wall was like a fortress against invading gases.
meanings.sent5: The gastightness of the jar was so perfect, not even a single molecule of gas could slip through.
